word_mean: ［西］熊果属植物：一种小灌木，学名为Arctostaphylos manzanita Parry (Ericaceae)，见于美国西部
其叶被当地印地安人作为药茶、收敛剂、强壮剂及利尿剂

list.abs: ...开成簇的粉色或者白色小花,它的果实是球形的,红棕色,通常会被鸟儿吃掉, 绵毛熊果树,woolly manzanita,的叶子下表面长着绒毛,生长在不列颠哥伦比亚,British Columbia,这种特别靠近北部的地.
...North American Pacific coast,的一种常青树木或灌木, 普通熊果树,common manzanita,生长在加利福尼亚州,California,和俄勒冈州,Oregon,可长至30英尺,9米,高,这种.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Spanish, diminutive of manzana 'apple'

means.word_mean: 1. chiefly evergreen shrubs of warm dry areas of western North America
2. evergreen tree of the Pacific coast of North America having glossy leathery leaves and orange-red edible berries; wood used for furniture and bark for tanning
